start.header: Ask a question about getting access to your eVisa
start.paragraph-1: Use this service if you have a question about creating your UK Visas and Immigration (UKVI) account and
start.paragraph-1-link-text: getting access to your online immigration status (eVisa)
start.paragraph-2: We will reply within 3 working days (Monday to Friday).
start.paragraph-3: You will need an email address where we can send our reply.
start.paragraph-4: If you do not do anything for 30 minutes, your answers will not be saved. Your question is only saved when you submit the form.

biometric-residence-permit-number.header: Do you know your biometric residence permit number?
biometric-residence-permit-number.paragraph: You can find this in the top right corner on the front panel of the permit.

reference-numbers.header: Do you have any of the following reference numbers?
reference-numbers.paragraph: This will help us link your enquiry to your account.

your-details.intro: Enter your contact details below. We will use these to respond to your question.

upload.intro: Upload screenshots or images of the problem, if you have them.
upload.accepted-types: Accepted files types are JPG, PNG or GIF
upload.upload-maximum: You may upload a maximum of {{maxUploads}} files

confirmation.content-copy-sent: We have sent you a confirmation email
confirmation.content-feedback-link-text: What do you think of this service?
